ffg-cc.start.p1: The Character Creator is a step-by-step process for creating a brand-new character for your game. Changes are saved as you progress, but the character is only created upon completion.
ffg-cc.start.credit: This tool is heavily inspired by the Hero Creation Tool. They get more credit than I do!
ffg-cc.basics.name: Name
ffg-cc.background.description.placeholde: Please select a background to see its description
